channel.title: Daniel Mejía Raigosa on Daniel Mejía Raigosa
channel.description: Recent content in Daniel Mejía Raigosa on Daniel Mejía Raigosa

item.title: Old Blog
item.description:
Daniel’s log book

The site https://dalogbook.blogspot.com/ is my old blog, which I haven’t updated since forever. Nevertheless I have lots of drafts soon to be published so stay tuned for updates.

item.title: Workshop of OpenCV 3.3.0 with Python3
item.description: A short course to introduce computer vision with the python bindings for OpenCV. The course materials are available at https://github.com/Daniel-M/Workshop_OpenCV

item.title: Adventures with Machine Learning
item.description: Slides for the study group on Deep Learning. The presentation was part of the motivation of the group. The slides and materials can be found at https://bitbucket.org/Daniel-M/ml_adventures_slides

item.title: Introduction to Python for Biologists
item.description: Course materials for the short course “Introducción a Python para Biologos” held at the University of Antioquia, east headquarters at Rionegro. The materials are available at https://github.com/Daniel-M/IntroPythonBiologos. An online version can be seen here

item.title: GNU Linux 2016
item.description:
Materials for the course on GNU/Linux console and fundamentals of version control with git. The course consisted of two sessions of 4 hours each,

  • First session
  • Second session

item.title: Cyclin-dependent kinase 5, a node protein in diminished tauopathy: A systems biology approach
item.description: #More detail can easily be written here using Markdown and $\rm \LaTeX$ math code.
